whatWeDo.title: What we do?
whatWeDo.paragraph1: PrebuiltUI helps you build faster by transforming your design vision into fully functional, production-ready UI components.
whatWeDo.paragraph2: Whether you're launching a SaaS app, landing page, or dashboard, our collection of Tailwind CSS components is crafted to boost your development speed and improve user experience.
whatWeDo.paragraph3: From UI design systems to automation-ready layouts, PrebuiltUI empowers you to build beautifully and scale effortlessly.

creations.item3Desc: Pastel floral tones that uplift interiors with beauty, freshness, and vibrant seasonal energy.

testimonials.title: Our Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from our satisfied customers about the benefits of using SlideX. We love hearing from our customers.
testimonials.review1: Super clean and easy to use. These Tailwind + React components saved me hours of dev time and countless lines of extra code!
testimonials.review2: The design quality is top-notch. Perfect balance between simplicity and style. Highly recommend for any creative developer!
testimonials.review3: Absolutely love the reusability of these components. My workflow feels 10x faster now with cleaner and more consistent layouts.
testimonials.review4: Clean, elegant, and efficient. These components are a dream for any modern web developer who values beautiful code.
testimonials.review5: I've tried dozens of UI kits, but this one just feels right. Everything works seamlessly and looks incredibly polished.
testimonials.review6: Brilliantly structured components with clean, modern styling. Makes development a joy and design updates super quick.

faq.title: FAQ's
faq.subtitle: Looking for answers to your frequently asked questions? Check out our FAQ's section below to find.
faq.q1: Do I need coding or design experience to use PrebuiltUI?
faq.a1: Basic coding knowledge (HTML/CSS, Tailwind) helps, but advanced design skills aren't required. You can use components as-is or customize them.
faq.q2: What is PrebuiltUI and how does it help developers and designers?
faq.a2: PrebuiltUI provides ready-to-use, customizable UI components and templates, saving time for developers and designers.
faq.q3: Can I use PrebuiltUI components in my existing project?
faq.a3: Yes, components can be integrated into HTML, React, Next.js, Vue, and other projects using Tailwind CSS.
faq.q4: How customizable are the generated components?
faq.a4: Components are highly customizable with Tailwind utility classes, theming, and structural adjustments.
faq.a5: There's no clear documentation on built-in collaboration features. Check their support for team options.
faq.q6: Can I try PrebuiltUI before purchasing a plan?
faq.a6: Yes, you can try PrebuiltUI with full access to features.
